resources.string: You may proceed to the next level if you find the correct sequence.

This app was created by datrueonejay, a first year student at U of T Scarborough. I hope you enjoy the app. If you have any comments on the app feel free to email me at datrueonejay@gmail.com. Special thanks to dmf444 for helping, and to ThatGuy for trying to break it.

This app was created by datrueonejay! a first year student at U of T Scarborough! I hope you enjoy the app! If you have any comments on the app feel free to email me at datrueonejay@gmail!com! Special thanks to dmf444 for helping! and to ThatGuy for trying to break it!
I do not own any of the rights to the pictures or music for this app. All rights reserved to their respective owners.
Finish as many levels as you can in the time
Finish the given levels as fast as you can
Return to the main menu? Your highscore will be saved.
\"The classic. If you\'re using this you\'ve probably unlocked nothing.\"
\"The inverted set. Keys are the wrong way yknow. Green is bad, and red is good. Simple.\"
\"The invisible set. Yeah. I\'m sure you\'ll find a way to use this.\"
\"Simon says press yellow. Or red. Or blue. Or green. Just pick the right one.\"
\"The Y-Box gamer. Like Y-Box 360, Y-Box One, the game Hay Low, all that.\"
\"The Paystation gamer. PS1, PS2, PS3, PS4, Big Little Planet.\"
\"The card dealer. Heart, diamonds, clubs, spades. Ace it or be a joke(r). \"
\"The Pants Pants Revolution skin. Make sure to time it right, er well actually it doesn\'t really matter.\"
Have this skin as a gift, it\'s on the house.
Score at least 5 in classic or time attack.
Score at least 10 in classic or time attack.
Score at least 10 in time attack.
Score at least 10 in time attack.
Achieve a time of under 20 seconds for beat the clock level 5.
Achieve a time of under 40 seconds for beat the clock level 7.

Each level has a sequence of moves (up, left, down, or right) which you must determine. Each correct move is one step closer to finishing the level. An incorrect move will reset your progress for that level.
